title: Free Online Image Converter - JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF | WikiHowTo.click
sub_title: Convert images between all major formats online. Free, fast, and secure.
description: WikiHowTo.click provides free online tools to convert images between popular formats such as JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF, TIFF, HEIC, AVIF, BMP, SVG, and ICO. All converters are secure, fast, and require no registration.

head.title: Free Online Image Converter Tools - JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF | WikiHowTo.click
head.description: Convert JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF, TIFF, HEIC, AVIF, BMP, SVG, and ICO images online. Fast, free, and secure image converter tools.
head.keywords: jpg to png, png to jpg, webp converter, gif to mp4, pdf to jpg, image converter
head.og_description: Convert images between all major formats online. Free and fast JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, and PDF converters.
head.twitter_description: Convert images instantly between JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF and more. No signup required.

h1.title: Free Online Image Converter Tools
h1.description: Easily convert your images between JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF, and more formats. Fast, private, and free to use on any device.

h2.title: Popular Image Conversions
h2.description:
• JPG to PNG - Preserve quality and add transparency
  • PNG to JPG - Compress PNG images to smaller JPG files
  • JPG to WebP - Modern format with high compression
  • WebP to JPG - Ensure compatibility with all platforms
  • PNG to WebP - Keep transparency with better compression
  • WebP to PNG - Restore universal compatibility

h2.title: More Image Conversions
h2.description:
• GIF to PNG - Better quality for static frames
  • PNG to GIF - Create simple animations
  • JPG to GIF - Shareable animated format
  • BMP to PNG - Smaller size, web-friendly
  • TIFF to JPG - Reduce size, easy sharing
  • HEIC to JPG - iPhone photos compatibility
  • AVIF to PNG - Transparency + compatibility
  • PNG to ICO - Create favicons and desktop icons
  • JPG to ICO - Convert photos to icon format
  • SVG to ICO - Vector graphics to icons
  • SVG to PNG - Vector to raster conversion
  • JPG to TIFF - High-quality archival format
  • PNG to TIFF - Lossless TIFF conversion
  • JPG to BMP - Windows bitmap format
  • PNG to BMP - Lossless bitmap conversion
  • JPG to AVIF - Modern high-compression format
  • PNG to AVIF - Next-generation image format
  • WebP to AVIF - Upgrade to latest format
  • BMP to ICO - Bitmap to icon conversion
  • TIFF to ICO - High-res to icon format
  • WebP to ICO - WebP to icon conversion

h2.title: PDF Conversions
h2.description:
• Image to PDF - Turn images into documents
  • JPG to PDF - Create print-ready PDFs
  • PNG to PDF - Preserve clarity in documents
  • PDF to JPG - Export pages as images
  • PDF to PNG - High-quality page images
  • Merge JPG to PDF - Combine multiple images
  • Combine PNG to PDF - Join PNGs into one file

h2.title: Video Conversions
h2.description:
• GIF to MP4 - Smaller, higher quality
  • MP4 to GIF - Shareable looping animations

h2.title: Limits & Notes
h2.description:
• One file per conversion for reliability and speed.
  • Max size: 16 MB per file.
  • Animated inputs: When a tool outputs a static format (e.g., PNG/JPG), only the first frame is used.

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Upload failed: Ensure file ‚â§ 16 MB and correct format.
  • Need transparency: Prefer PNG/WebP/AVIF over JPG.
  • Colors look off: Outputs are normalized to sRGB for consistency.

h2.title: Supported Image Formats
h2.description: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, PDF, TIFF, HEIC, AVIF, BMP, SVG, ICO

faq.question: Are all image converters free?
faq.answer: Yes, all image conversion tools are free with no hidden fees or watermarks.

faq.question: Do you support batch conversion?
faq.answer: Each page converts one file at a time for stability. Repeat the process for multiple files.

faq.question: Is there a file size limit?
faq.answer: Yes. The current limit is 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Yes. Uploads are encrypted and deleted automatically after processing.

note: Disclaimer: Output quality depends on the input file and target format capabilities.
